titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A Proclamation declaring the right of the Fellowship and Company of English Merchants for Discovering of New Trades (commonly called the Muscovia Company) to the sole fishing for whales upon the coasts of Green-land and Chery-Island, and for restraining and prohibiting of all others.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our palace of Westminster the 9th day of March, in the year of Our Lord, 1657.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
